text.__SUMMARY__: Pluteus nigroviridis is a mushroom in the family Pluteaceae. Found in Europe, it was first described scientifically by Hungarian mycologist Margit Babos in 1983.
text.Chemistry: Fruit bodies of the fungus contain the psychoactive compounds psilocin and psilocybin.
